comment:
* An unchecked exception thrown when {@code getaddrinfo} or {@code getnameinfo} fails.
 * This exception contains the native {@link #error} value, should sophisticated
 * callers need to adjust their behavior based on the exact failure.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: error
variables.comment: * The native error value, for comparison with the {@code GAI_} constants in {@link OsConstants}.

methods.name: public String getMessage()
methods.comment:
* Converts the stashed function name and error value to a human-readable string.
     * We do this here rather than in the constructor so that callers only pay for
     * this if they need it.

methods.name: public UnknownHostException rethrowAsUnknownHostException(String detailMessage) throws UnknownHostException

methodNames: public UnknownHostException rethrowAsUnknownHostException(String detailMessage) throws UnknownHostException
